[b][color=white]Convo Commands[/color][/b]
A new set of commands have been added to the convo. Type "/help" to view a list of available commands. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6094778]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Discord Postbit Button[/color][/b]
Discord Postbit button got added to the posts of those users who have authorized their Discords with HF. It's preferred to authorize your Discords as soon as possible. Later on, you won't be able to advertise your Discord Channels/IDs. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6095021]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Bytes Flip via Convo[/color][/b]
Now users can flip their Bytes in the HF Convo room. [i][size=x-small][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6095057]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2331053][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/notablethreads-mix.png[/img][/url][/align]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Announcements[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6095057][color=#FFFFFF]Bytes Flip via Convo[/color][/url] - [mention=175033]
A brand-new feature has been added by Xerotic in the new Convo system. You can now coin flip bytes within your Convo's with other members of the forum. This has been something many members have wanted for a little time now and since it has been added everyone is loving the new ability around the convo system.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6095021][color=#FFFFFF]Discord Postbit Button[/color][/url] - [mention=1]
A brand-new button will now appear under each post you make if you have added and verified your discord account with Hack Forums. The new button has been added to the site to help reduce and maybe even stoop off-site scamming. This doesn't mean you won't be scammed, but it does help reduce it.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6094778][color=#FFFFFF]Convo /leave[/color][/url] - [mention=175033]
Another brand-new feature has been added to the Convo system where you can leave the conversation by simply typing in /leave. This means if you are in a multi-user convo you can leave it with ease by just using the command. The update also announced the use of the command /help to show some other commands as well.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Informational Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6093979][color=#FFFFFF]Tik Tok Canceled[/color][/url] - [mention=2097293]
The app known as Tik Tok has been called out by the white house for spying on the users that they have and because of this some companies have asked their employees to no longer use the app in any way shape or form and to delete the app for safety reasons. This has caused a massive outrage to some, but the main pointer of the whole thing is that there is no public proof that the app is really spying on you other than the agreement that you sign when you get an account.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Entertaining Threads[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6094194][color=#FFFFFF]I got my first tattoo. What do you guys think?[/color][/url] - [mention=1727666]
A user currently going by the name of Moon Rock has shared with us their first tattoo. The tattoo is of an AR-15, and it is on the back of his wrist. The user has claimed it really hurt when it was above their veins but it was worth it. Some members have claimed it is a good start and some have stated that the tattoo is rubish. Share what you think about the tattoo on the thread.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6095227][color=#FFFFFF]why are old people always looking for beef[/color][/url] - [mention=4519341]
A young member known as hfrocket1713 has made a thread talking about how they seem to always have issues with people in there late 40's & 50's. We think that you will find this thread is a very entertaining thread plus it is only a small read since its a very short story so why not spend a few seconds reading about how hfrocket1713 nearly beat someone for what they said.

[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6095225][color=#FFFFFF]How has life changed in Lockdown?[/color][/url] - [mention=3890965]
Lockdown is a topic that is still on everyone's mind but just trying to skip past to make life a little easier right now. We understand that you don't want to talk too much about it, but lockdown life has changed everyone. Some in a very good way for their health and wellbeing and some have just gone from dark to even darker somehow.
[/list]

[color=#FFFFFF][b]Contests & Giveaways[/b][/color]
[list]
[*][url=https://hackforums.net/showthread.php?tid=6093265][color=#FFFFFF]$50 BTC Giveaway[/color][/url] - [mention=3092541]
A site member known as Glided has stated that they are feeling generous and that they would like to give one very lucky member of the site $50 in bitcoin. All you have to do is make a comment and that's it no need to give them any popularity or quick love just a good old comment.
[/list]

[color=transparent]       [/color][/size][/font]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=4570721][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/animenews-megane.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]My Teen Romantic Comedy SNAFU Climax! Anime Listed With 12 Episodes[/color][/b]
If you are up to date with the current anime season, then you will know that the third season of "My Teen Romantic Comedy" has finally aired. The anime has listed that there will be a total of 12 episodes airing. The anime was originally scheduled for the spring 2020 anime season, but was delayed because of the COVID-19 epidemic. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/daily-briefs/2020-07-09/my-teen-romantic-comedy-snafu-climax-anime-listed-with-12-episodes/.161658]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]A Certain Scientific Railgun T Anime's Video Previews Dream Ranker Arc[/color][/b]
The second half of "A Certain Scientific Railgun T" has been delayed due to COVID-19. The next episode in the series, episode 16, will not be released until July 24. A short trailer was released, previewing the adaption of the "Dream Ranker arc." Three new cast members will be introduced in this arc—Atsumi Tanezaki as Ryōko Kuriba, Mayu Mineda as Shaei Miyama, and Sayumi Suzushiro as Rakko Yumiya. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-07-10/a-certain-scientific-railgun-t-anime-video-previews-dream-ranker-arc/.161690]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Date A Bullet Theatrical Anime Reveals 2-Part Premiere, Trailer, Songs[/color][/b]
This year, two movies will be released based on the "Date A Live Fragment: Date A Bullet" spinoff novel series. If you are a big fan of the character Tokisaki Kurumi, then you better watch these films. The first film, "Date A Bullet: Dead or Bullet," will be released this August and revolve around a "battle royale." The second movie, "Date A Bullet: Nightmare or Queen," will be released in November of this year and will continue the first movie. Check out the trailer [url=https://youtu.be/WdTagKn0cSM]here[/url]. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-07-10/date-a-bullet-theatrical-anime-reveals-2-part-premiere-trailer-songs/.161689]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Life-Size Freedom Gundam Statue to Rise Above Shanghai[/color][/b]
Scheduled to be unveiled sometime later this year, Sunrise Inc. will be working with a family company, Gundam China Project, to create a life-size ZGMF-X10A Freedom Gundam statue in Shangai, China. There has been no announcement on when this will be completed. The statue is said to be a 59-foot-tall model. Additionally, Sunrise Inc. will be unveiling an RX-78-2 Gundam statue in Yokohama, Japan sometime this year, which will also be a 59-foot-tall model; however, this one will have the ability to move and make sounds! [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-07-11/life-size-freedom-gundam-statue-to-rise-above-shanghai/.161726]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]HBO Max Adds Death Note, Hunter x Hunter, Food Wars![/color][/b]
If you are a subscriber of the HBO Max streaming service, you'll be pleased to know that more anime titles have been added. At the release of the streaming service back in May of this year, 17 different titles provided by Crunchyroll were added to the catalog. All episodes of Death Note, the first 99 episodes of Hunter x Hunter (2011), and all of the episodes in the fourth season of Shokugeki no Soma have been added to HBO max on June 30. If you are a fan of the Studio Ghibli film series, you will also be glad to hear that 21 films are available to watch, including the classics like Spirited Away, My Neighbor Totoro, and Princess Mononoke. [i][size=x-small][url=https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2020-07-11/hbo-max-adds-death-note-hunter-x-hunter-food-wars-tower-of-god-anime/.161708]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[color=transparent]   [/color]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2774521][img]https://www.hackforums.news/assets/v4/cryptonews-james.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=white]Coinbase Preparing to Launch on the Stock Market[/color][/b]
Coinbase Inc. is reportedly looking to list on the stock exchange, according to sources speaking with Reuters. The California-based cryptocurrency firm allows customers to exchange and store a select group of coins and is responsible for over $200 billion worth of trades. In its 2018 Series E funding round, Coinbase raised $300 million from several venture capital firms, valuing the company at over $8 billion. Joining the stock market is not a simple task, though, and would require the company to get approval from the SEC. They would be the first major cryptocurrency exchange service publicly listed and traded—a listing that, if well-executed, would bring a large amount of awareness and publicity to the crypto scene.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.reuters.com/article/us-coinbase-ipo-exclusive/exclusive-crypto-exchange-coinbase-readies-landmark-stock-market-listing-sources-say-idUSKBN24A21W] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]TikTok Trend Doubles Dogecoin Price[/color][/b]
The popular meme coin saw a boost in its price as it doubled briefly and reached a two-year high. In 2013, DOGE was released as a joke cryptocurrency to mock the financial system, and it has consistently stayed in the top 100 coins by market capitalization. TikTok is a social media platform where users can share short videos, usually with a song tied to them, that other users can see. Many people use it to post memes. As Dogecoin is a meme coin, it is only fitting that the latest trend is based on a meme of getting rich quick when it hits $1. James Galante's video encouraging people to invest has now reached over 900,000 views and, in part, contributed to Bitfinex listing the coin on their platform. As with many other cryptos, it is unlikely that DOGE will reach $1 anytime soon due to having such a high circulating supply, meaning those duped by the videos may be disappointed.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.forbes.com/sites/billybambrough/2020/07/09/lets-all-get-rich-teen-tiktok-traders-want-to-send-joke-bitcoin-rival-dogecoin-to-the-moon/#58cbae346b7a] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[b][color=white]Binance Joins Swipe's Board of Directors[/color][/b]
In its second acquisition of 2020, Binance, one of the most popular cryptocurrency exchanges, has acquired Swipe, a leading Visa debit card provider for crypto users. Their banking app gives customers access to a wide range of coins to exchange between and spend instantly. Binance CEO Changpeng Zhao (CZ) labeled this move as one that "will make the crypto experience much better for everyone," through allowing merchants to accept fiat currency while people are spending their crypto balances. Cryptocurrency advocates often refer to debit and credit cards as critical tools for taking the digital assets mainstream. They allow consumers to continue spending money as they usually would while enabling store owners to continue accepting payments as they would, without making special accommodations.[i][size=x-small][url=https://www.binance.com/en/blog/421499824684900723/Binance-and-Swipe-Partner-to-Bridge-Crypto-and-Commerce-Announce-Acquisition-] >>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[align=center][url=https://hackforums.net/member.php?action=profile&uid=2890436][img]https://hackforums.news/assets/v4/vibes-pikachu.png[/img][/url][/align]

[b][color=#ccffff]Horoscopes[/color][/b] / [i]Jul 13, 2020 - Jul 19, 2020[/i]

[list]
[*][b][color=#cc3333]Aries ♈[/color][/b]
[i]"Dynamic Mars in your sign can instill a desire to make fast progress, but this may not be so easy this week.

The sun in Cancer and your domestic sector opposes jovial Jupiter on Tuesday and powerbroker Pluto on Wednesday, and this can ramp up the tension. With Jupiter and Pluto at close quarters in your sector of goals and career, there can be a compulsive need to aim high and try to surpass yourself. This is muted for now because both planets are currently retrograde, but the feeling of wanting more than you have could still be powerful.

Add to this the fact that dynamic Mars merges with healer Chiron this week, which could make you aware of your weak points and vulnerabilities. Use this opportunity to take stock and perhaps lower your expectations so you don’t feel you’re reaching beyond your limits and causing more stress in the process."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=1]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff99ff]Taurus ♉[/color][/b]
[i]"Is it best to stay local or extend your plans to include worldwide domination? This could be something you’re considering over this week as the sun in your sector of communication and local environment opposes expansive Jupiter and potent Pluto in a more cosmopolitan zone.

While you might have a desire to expand your reach, with both Jupiter and Pluto retrograde at this time, it might not be a top priority. However, the coming days could find you making some decisions to help you move things forward. The main point is to be realistic, because with sobering Saturn in your sector of far horizons, you’re encouraged not to run before you can walk.

In addition, warrior Mars in a secluded sector connects with healer Chiron, which might encourage you to find closure on an event that you’d prefer to sweep under the carpet. This can be a good time to deal with it."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=2]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#66cc33]Gemini ♊[/color][/b]
[i]"Issues around money and resources in general continue to be in focus and look to be so for some time into the future. For now, you might be trying to find a balance between personal needs and paying off any outstanding bills or debts.

This issue may seem to grow more important this week, and you could be eager to find a solution that works. If you’re under pressure, you’d be wise to come up with a plan that you’re comfortable with. Both expansive Jupiter and volcanic Pluto are retrograde and moving apart, so you may find there’s less resistance to your suggestions than you think. This can be good news.

A merger between fiery Mars and healer Chiron in your social sector can be a call to seek friends you resonate with at a deeper level. It might be time to find your tribe."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=3]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3399ff]Cancer ♋[/color][/b]
[i]"You might be very eager to forge ahead with an ambitious goal or career plan only to find that the emphasis on your relationship zone is making this difficult. You could be channeling a lot of energy into other people and their needs and plans, and this week you could be a tad resentful about this. When are you going to get the time to yourself that you deserve? It could be a while unless you take a stand.

The good news is that if you put it to those concerned, they may be more inclined to listen. Even so, it might take a lot of discussion, negotiation, and compromise before you feel satisfied. But this also comes down to you if you need to put your priorities higher up your to-do list. Until you do that, this issue could continue.

On the upside, chatty Mercury is now moving forward your sign, so this is very much the time to talk things over."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=4]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#ff9933]Leo ♌[/color][/b]
[i]"The need for quiet and a chance to recharge could clash with a busy work schedule that seems to show no signs of letting up. You might be very eager to enjoy some alone time to meditate, reflect, and attend to spiritual matters. Getting the chance to tap into a higher power or source energy can be invigorating, inspiring, and healing. If can’t do this, you could soon find yourself flagging and lacking in creativity.

You might need to find some way to change your work schedule so you can enjoy a better work/life balance. With both philosophical Jupiter and radical Pluto retrograde in your lifestyle sector, along with sobering Saturn, this one of the better times to restructure things until you get it right.

You might also need to change your beliefs about what is possible for you, and this week you could be ready to do just that."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=5]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#339933]Virgo ♍[/color][/b]
[i]"Fiery Mars is usually associated with power and vigor, but its journey through an intense emotional sector could find you directing your energy to psychological issues. Your healing nature may mean you have a deep understanding of how emotional blockages can prevent you from experiencing success and happiness in life. This week, a merger between warrior Mars and healer Chiron can encourage you to take this process further. Doing so could prove very freeing.

Other powerful influences may affect you this week, too. The sun in your social sector opposes jovial Jupiter and radical Pluto in your leisure zone. This can be a source of tension that highlights your social life and need to mingle, as well as a desire to take a deeper dive into your creative side.

You might find that joining groups with those who share your creative skills and abilities is very inspirational, even if you do it online. You can pick up tips and tricks that will enhance your work and rekindle your enthusiasm."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=6]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#3366ff]Libra ♎[/color][/b]
[i]"The three areas of your life that seem to be your main focus now are your career and ambitions, home and family life, and relationships.

Dynamic Mars is moving through Aries, and you may find this to be a great opportunity to clear the air and rekindle the passion in your partnership. But as this fiery planet merges with Chiron this week, a celestial body linked with the wounded healer, you may become aware of how experiences from the past are affecting your current relationship and perhaps other associations as well.

This is a good time to address this issue further, perhaps by using the services of a counselor, therapist, or relationship coach. Getting the help you need, even if you do it online, could be key to enjoying a happy love life and social life in the future.

Finally, with the sun making some awkward aspects this week, don’t let family members undermine your efforts concerning an important ambition."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=7]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#8B0000]Scorpio ♏[/color][/b]
[i]"There are three powerful planets in your sector of talk and thought, so this is very much a time to understand the power of thinking and how it can shape your circumstances. With upbeat Jupiter, power-hungry Pluto, and sobering Saturn in this zone, your thoughts may be very focused and therefore able to influence your life more than they might normally.

Casually thinking of someone you haven’t heard from in a while could result in them giving you a call. But it’s more than that, because whatever you focus your mind on intensely can take on the color and quality of your thoughts about it. This trio of planets can inspire you to use your thinking wisely to get the results you want rather than dwelling on those you don’t.

And the sun in your sector of opportunity can help in this by encouraging you to involve yourself with ideas that can change your life and have that ring of truth about them."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=8]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#FFFF00]Sagittarius ♐[/color][/b]
[i]"The sun in an intense sector opposes both optimistic Jupiter and underworld Pluto this week, which can bring a range of issues into greater focus. But, in essence, you might wonder how you can improve your finances as well as your love life, business affairs, and overall feeling of happiness.

It may be a question of getting in touch with emotions that are affecting these key areas without you realizing it. In turn, this might mean linking up with a counselor or therapist, even online, who can assist you with asking the right question so you can connect with the feelings and begin to process through them.

However much it might seem like an issue or problem would be resolved if you had more money, looking deeper can get to root cause. And once that is resolved, the money may flow more freely into your life."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=9]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#663333]Capricorn ♑[/color][/b]
[i]"Input from others could be very helpful this week if it enables you to see things from a fresh perspective. With the sun in your sector of relating and opposing both positive Jupiter and underworld Pluto in your sign, their thoughts could help you clarify matters and even see the bigger picture.

With cautious Saturn retrograde in Capricorn, and Jupiter and Pluto also retrograde, some aspects of your life may seem backward. Where you should be reaping success and seeing signs of progress, you might find that projects and plans are stalling and nothing is working out as you’d hoped.

Be patient. The tide will turn in the coming months. If someone can give you confidence to carry on and do your best, then their words could prove very uplifting. If you’ve put a lot of work into something that means a great deal to you, know that it will bear fruit."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=10]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#9966ff]Aquarius ♒[/color][/b]
[i]"The more you delve into the deeper layers of your subconscious mind, the more you can discover about yourself. With a focus on this sector for some time to come, you may already have learned a lot about what makes you tick, but there is likely a lot more to find out.

This week could see you eager to integrate a practice into your daily life that can help you dig deeper and find out more. This might involve meditation, journaling, daily dreamwork, guided meditation, or something else. Factoring this into your schedule can ground your understanding, and this in turn means that your realizations and insights can bring positive change to your daily life.

You need to be balanced by being rooted in your everyday life, especially if you’re making powerful inner discoveries and working to understand the mystery of your life, and this week highlights this."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=11]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]

[*][b][color=#cccc66]Pisces ♓[/color][/b]
[i]"Your creative and imaginative side is in focus this week, encouraging you to enjoy channeling your natural talents into art, crafts, music, dance, or whatever your favorite mode of expression is. This week can see you enhance your passion for a certain mode of expression by connecting with others who share your interests. You may hook up with an artist, and their work could inspire aspects of your work.

Online cultural events could be another source of inspiration that takes your ideas in exciting new directions.

There is also the issue of romance. You may have on your eye on someone who doesn’t seem interested. Let things unfold naturally, and you may find that either you lose interest or the relationship develops slowly but surely so that over time this bond gains in strength. This person could be quite compelling, which may be why you’re so eager to persist."[/i][i][size=xx-small][url=https://www.horoscope.com/us/horoscopes/general/horoscope-general-weekly.aspx?sign=12]>>Source[/url][/size][/i]
[/list]
